meanings.definition: The fact or state of not happening or existing.
meanings.sent1: The nonoccurrence of rain caused the farmers to worry about their crops.
meanings.sent2: The nonoccurrence of any accidents made the road trip enjoyable.
meanings.sent3: The nonoccurrence of the usual traffic jam was a pleasant surprise for commuters.
meanings.sent4: The nonoccurrence of any response left her feeling unheard and alone.
meanings.sent5: The nonoccurrence of his usual morning routine signaled something was amiss.

meanings.definition: The absence or lack of occurrence.
meanings.sent1: The nonoccurrence of any noise in the house made it feel eerie.
meanings.sent2: The nonoccurrence of any visitors made her feel lonely.
meanings.sent3: The nonoccurrence of his favorite show on TV left him bored.
meanings.sent4: The nonoccurrence of any progress in the project was frustrating.
meanings.sent5: The nonoccurrence of any celebration for his birthday made him sad.
